alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 1:46AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan and northwestern Delaware Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 146 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Arlington to near Jesup. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aurora around 150 AM CDT. Independence around 200 AM CDT. Lamont around 205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Dundee and Quasqueton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
